attributes.action: I want the UK prime minister to reverse the Chagos Archipelago deal.
attributes.additional_details:
It is not in the uks best interest to do this as it is weakening our security. 
I think this should be a decision of the Brittish citizens as it is also their tax money. Can the prime minister tell us where this money is coming from and why it is costing so much money to give something away that was ours and then rent it back and why he wanted the deal pushed through so quickly.
attributes.background:
I believe that it is not in the uks best interest and is a huge security risk for the uk. 
I think there should be an investigation why this is costing so much money.
I also want him to help us unterstand why we are giving away something that was ours and paying to rent it back.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Review decision to cede sovereignty of the Chagos Islands to Mauritius
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702712

Referendum on UK sovereignty over the Chagos Islands.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/704312

Hold an inquiry before transferring the Chagos Islands to Mauritius
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701675
